description.value:
Element water; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 1
Prerequisite tiefling or Planar Infusion (Abaddon, Abyss, or Hell)
Saving Throw Will negates; SR yes

You can spend 1 full round to draw upon the waters of the River Styx to erase memories of a target. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.5ll7q13p0skbgonc]{Modify Memory}, except that it can only eliminate memories.
